verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ataovy ao am-bavako
'Zay hoteneniko.
Ny hira sy vavaka
Mba ho toy ny Anao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:

'Zaho te hitovy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ny fomba fihevitro,
Ny asa sy fiainako,
Entiko eo aminao
Hotarihinao.
'Zaho te hitovy, sns

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Fa mihelina tokoa
Sy mandalo ny ety,
Eo aminao Tompo soa
Mahatsara ahy.
'Zaho te hitovy, sns

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ampianaro mba hahay
Hampijoro ho iray
Ny fo, saina sy fanahy
Ry Tompo mpiahy.
'Zaho te hitovy, sns
